item.title: Eddie Cochran - Summertime Blues
item.description:
Well I’m a gonna
raise a fuss
I’m a gonna
raise a holler
I’ve been working
all summer
Just to try to
earn a dollar
Well the time
will come when baby
Try to get a date
my boss says
No dice girl
you gonna work late
Sometimes I wonder
what I’m a gonna do
But there ain’t
no cure for
The summertime
blues-

Oh well my mom and
brother told me
Son you gonna make
some money
But if you want to use
the car to go riding
Next Sunday
oh well I didn’t go
To work told the boss
I was sick
You can’t use the car
cause you didn’t work
Late sometimes
I wonder what
I’m a gonna do
but there ain’t
No cure for
the summertime blues-

I’m gonna take
two weeks gonna have
A fine vacation
I’m gonna take
My problem
to the united nations
Well I called
the congressman
And he said quote
I’d like to help you
Honey but you’re
too young to vote
Sometimes I wonder
what I’m a gonna do
And there ain’t
no cure for
the summertime
blues-
